channel.title: Halo tag
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i225.photobucket.com/albums/dd111/manofwar012/halosotw.jpg[/img]
Well since I'm on a two hour delay, I decided to make a tag for another forums SOTW, the theme was Halo. I started to follow a tutorial but then got off of it and added my own effects, trying to work more with C4D's in this one. I like the C4D work around the Chief the best, what do you think?
Comment

item.title: Halo tag
item.dc:creator: @YupolaScape YupolaScape
item.description:
@YupolaScape wrote:

[quote=“the bank, post:7, topic:245555”][quote author=YupolaScape link=topic=322003.msg2559915#msg2559915 date=1228087310]
I dont like any of his work it all looks the same, no experimentation. This is no exception.
[/quote]That comment was unneeded and mean, next time keep it to yourself, seeing as you are no better.[/quote]
Infact, you cant say that as probably havent seen any of my latest work. Which I do not post anymore.

Read full topic

item.title: Halo tag
item.dc:creator: @Rezzeh Rezzeh
item.description:
@Rezzeh wrote:

i like it, except for the render, the C4Ds, the brushes, the background/stock, and the text. If you took them all out, i think it’d look better (y)

item.title: Halo tag
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

FastBawlz:

Also, the vector brushes in the background are sort of weird…

Besides that random octopus thing, I thought they fit nicely. It was the splatter brushes that threw me off.
